E-Mail Messages
Date: Wednesday, 5/28/1988
Subject: Extension?
Hello Sir,
Are you interested in negotiating a contract extension?
You know, I'm in my final year. I'd like to stay here!

Sincerely,
Andre Dawson



Date: Monday, 6/2/1988
Subject: Progress of Scott Cooper
Dear Sir,
Scott Cooper has nothing more to prove at A St. Lucie Mets!
He has an AVG of .286 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt him at all.

Regards,
Scouting Director

Date: Thursday, 7/17/1988
Subject: Jack Voigt failed learning new position
Jack Voigt doesn't seem to make
any progress learning his new position, Shortstop.
I would give up this experiment before his hitting suffers.

Regards,
Your scouting director
